content: Yes, every action counts no matter how small it may seem. When people start to make small changes in their daily lives, it can add up to make a big difference in reducing carbon footprint and creating a more sustainable future. It's great to see that the steps taken by your city government are inspiring you and others in your community to make more eco-friendly choices. Keep up the good work! And the more people that get involved, the greater the impact we can have on creating a better future for our planet.
